0.text:
Hi guys,
Welcome to my February foodie favourites,

3.text:
I feel like I've been lovin' absolutely everything
this month.

6.text: So here's everything I'be been enjoying.

8.text:
I've been loving daffodils which is why I've
got them in the background

13.text:
I've also been loving leeks
and happy St David's that just happens to

16.text:
be a coincidence
but I've been eating a lot of leek dishes

20.text:
too
so I've been really enjoying those.

24.text:
I don't have any lusts this month and that's
because I've recently crossed two things off

28.text:
my list that i really wanted.
The first one was one I mentioned a few weeks

32.text:
ago.
And it's this tortilla press,

34.text:
I haven't actually used it yet.
It's really heavy, it's cast iron,

37.text:
I think it's going to do a good job
sadly though,I went to order the corn flour

42.text:
for it
so the corn that you make the tortillas with

44.text:
and it was all out of stock.
So it might be a little while before I get

48.text:
to make those or I may try making it with
just regular

52.text:
umm wheat flour.
The other product that I was going to have

57.text:
on my lust list this month but I actually
bought it was lifetime membership to the National

62.text:
Trust.
we bought a couples pass for life

65.text:
for, so free entry to the National Trust for
the rest of our life

68.text:
which is really amazing
so expect lots of National Trust visit vlogs

76.text:
On TV I've been enjoying Monty Don's new show
which is big dream, small garden

80.text:
That is the right way round
you want to get that the right way round

83.text:
That's been really interesting because,
it's kind of regular people doing up their

88.text:
gardens
although the ones I've been they do try and

91.text:
seem to push they're budget a little bit further
than the people initially say they want to

95.text:
spend.
But I think that happens whenever you start

100.text:
I could do with some Netflix recommendations,
I resubscribed this month for House of Cards

106.text:
because the next series of that is coming
out.

108.text:
And I know Noor Bloor, you recommended to
me to watch the food series which is by Michael

114.text:
Pollan and I'm looking forward to checking
that one out as well.

117.text:
But If you've got another recommendations
I would really like to hear them.

121.text:
One thing that did annoy me a little bit this
month was

124.text:
was ordered pizza from Domino's and it was
overdone.

127.text:
the cheese wasn't nice and stringy and melty
which is what I really like and i can't quite

131.text:
get the same at home.
In my own oven, you really need like the woodfired

137.text:
kind of oven for the pizza's to do that.
And a little while ago we had a Papa John's

141.text:
pizza.
I enjoyed the base of that more but it wasn't

143.text:
quite warm when it arrived.
So the whole experience is just solidified

147.text:
for me,
make your own, it's much better.

149.text:
the last couple of weeks it has been a little
bit drier so I've been able to get to the

154.text:
plot.
I'm just figuring out how I'm going to be

157.text:
able to show you this.
I've got these amazing socks which I've been

159.text:
wearing under my wellies,
it's been really important for keeping my

162.text:
feet warm where I'm digging
and they're these ones

166.text:
which are from heat holders
and they come up quite a long way

169.text:
and they're really fleecy and lined inside
which is really good.

176.text:
I feel like there's even more things that
I've been lovin' that I'm not thinking of

179.text:
right now.
hot crossed buns are out

181.text:
Easter eggs they're amazing
they're all coming onto season

184.text:
they're in the shops
so there's lots of really nice foodie things

187.text:
out there.
We're on the verge of asparagus season

190.text:
we're not quite there yet.
Oh I know, purple sprouting broccoli

193.text:
I've been really enjoying that as well.
So many things.

197.text:
Umm, yeah, let me know what you've been enjoying
over the last month

200.text:
and I'll see you again soon.
Thanks fir watching.

goodnight.
